title: At Henley
creator_credit: Verity Films, Film Producers Guild and Seafield Head
brief_description: The work of the Administrative Staff College at Henley where a method of managerial development is used to give further training to men and women in their late thirties and early forties. The work and final reports of some of the groups are shown.
